title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Reaches $100 Billion AUM – Largest ETF Launch in History
shortdescription: IBIT shatters all records as institutional adoption accelerates beyond expectations.
description: iShares Bitcoin Trust holds 4.5% of all Bitcoin ever mined — combined spot ETF market surpasses gold ETFs.
author: Emma Chen

title: Ripple vs SEC Case Officially Dismissed – XRP Surges 40% Overnight
shortdescription: After 4 years, judge rules XRP not a security in landmark victory.
description: SEC drops appeal after devastating court loss – XRP relisted on major U.S. exchanges within hours.
author: Emma Chen

title: Coinbase Launches Decentralized Exchange on Base – Competes Directly with Uniswap
shortdescription: Largest U.S. exchange enters DEX market with zero-fee trading and institutional-grade liquidity.
description: Coinbase DEX launches with $5B TVL — integrates with 100M+ user base and bridges CeFi and DeFi.
author: Emma Chen
